page.title: 13Draycott show
page.content:
Since 1905 there has always been an annual agricultural and horticultural show. At present it is kept going by the hard work and interest of the people running it.
One of the main attractions is the Show Tent which contains the competition entries, which range from flower arranging and dress making to best vegetables and wine making. There are also childrens' competitions including picture making, handwriting and fancy dress.
The most popular sideshows are the Punch and Judy, tug of war, tossing the sheaf (a bale of hay is thrown over a horizontal bar, using a pole) and the six aside football competition.
